pages.title: Frozen Heart
pages.text: A late-game power source that harnesses the extreme cold itself. Requires a diamond, frozen obsidian (forms on surface in Phase 4+), blue ice, and ice shards.$(br2)The Frozen Heart is the key component of the Geothermal Core â€” your endgame heat source.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA named it the "Frozen Heart" because "Cryogenic Thermal Inversion Matrix" didn't fit on the label. Also because the Wellness Division thought it was poetic. They were going through a phase.$()

A diamond at the center, surrounded by blue ice, ice shards, and frozen obsidian. Somehow the combination of "extremely cold things around a diamond" produces heat. ORSA Physics gave up trying to explain it and just wrote "it works" in the report.
